fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • In a Shortcut on Thursday we said Lidl and Aldi were “the UK’s fifth and seventh largest grocers respectively”; Lidl is seventh and Aldi is fifth (Does a Lidl really lower house prices?, page 2, G2). • A picture captioned “Banksy’s 2019 Brexit mural, Dover” was taken in 2019, but the mural appeared in 2017 (An open letter to Corbyn, 30 July, page 4, Journal). • Other recently corrected articles include: Shopping at the farmers’ market on food stamps: ‘Not just for white foodies’ Three men awarded £414,000 for malicious prosecution by police Saudi state part-owns Evening Standard and Independent, court told Morning after: Boris Johnson recovers from Lebedev’s exotic Italian party
